description: Guernsey will now allow business travellers to take day trip meetings on the island.
title: Guernsey to allow one-day 'business tunnel' trips
title_page: Guernsey to allow one-day 'business tunnel' trips - BBC News
maintext: "It's important to us that any lifting of restrictions on travel is safe, so that we don't find ourselves needing to lockdown our local community which would have a big impact on the economy, but also on each of us as individuals," Gavin St Pier said.
